title: Yasuo could be deleted from the game and there would still be hourly QQ threads on this board
body: It's very frightening how stubborn all of these players are.  Spend time QQing on boards about an easy to beat champion instead of learning how to play the game.

replies.body: ya there would be, from all the salty yas players

Right. Even Arkadata agrees that Yasuo is both too strong and toxic, and made a huge thread about nerfing him in a way that would help with both problems, but opinion of a gold player maining a direct counter is obviously more relevant.

Yasuo is easy to beat, boys. We have all been wrong since the beginning.

aren't you from GD?
then just ignore the board, who cares about QQ
Yes there would be Yasuo mains crying about nobody liking them as always.
That's because once they're done crying about one thing, they instantly find another.
